title: Learning Strategy Design Through Analysis of Engagement and Performance Relationships in Virtual Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: University-Level Foundational Learning Competencies and Online Learning Tool Proficiency
context.additional_context: Need to design simulation/VR learning activities in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments, considering learning designs linked to offline activities.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the correlation between individual participation patterns and academic performance through VLE activity log analysis.
Learners can design at least three VLE utilization strategies optimized for directive learning styles.
Learners can propose assessment-integrated approaches using VLE tools (quizzes, discussion boards, etc.) in the social sciences domain.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
